attributes.additional_details: Key workers are having to put their lives at risk by keeping the country going during this worldwide pandemic. Whilst others are able to sit at home socially distancing themselves, the nation is having to rely on key workers to keep society running; all for the health and safety of other people. Surely, it is unfair that they are being taxed for practically putting their own lives and health at risk during a crisis like the COVID-19.
attributes.background: The key workers should not be getting taxed at a time like this as they are helping run the country.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
